name: BipolarDisorder
title: Bipolar Disorder
description:
This value set is created for the NCQA's ECDS measures. It contains notes from the following HEDIS value sets:
1) Bipolar Disorder
2) Bipolar Disorder ECDS
3) Other Bipolar Disorder
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for a diagnosis of bipolar disorder.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a diagnosis of bipolar I disorder or manic episode.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent a diagnosis of other bipolar disorder, bipolar II disorder or unspecified bipolar disorder.)
